akas: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (original title)
AXI: Avengers of Xtreme Illusions USA (alternative spelling)
akas from release info: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (original title)
AXI: Avengers of Xtreme Illusions USA (alternative spelling)

1.title: Kreep

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Two people express the familiar feeling of being the Kreep, one through dance, and one through song.

2.title: Love for All Seasons

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: A fighting couple gets into hilarious hijinks when they accidentally get called in for the same modeling gig.

3.title: Strange Bird

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: A tormented and very special girl cannot fall asleep - or the dreams will get her.

4.title: Kiss, Cook, Bang Bang

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: When a chef cheats on his wife, he'll get a taste of a woman's scorn.

1.title: Eye of the Beholder

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: A man known as "The Keyholder" (Phillip Pacman Chbeeb) is awakened by demons that have deteriorated his mind and captured his body. After being buried for some time, he finds his way to his home where he finds his wife (Katrina Hansen) who may know more about his situation than perceived.

2.title: Professor M (Part 1 & 2)

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Professor M (Di Moon Zhang), who leads a research team from a branch of Area 51 specialists, is sent to an uncharted land mass to discover it and its possibilities for development. While perusing through this land, he is poisoned by snakes, rescued and brought back to consciousness, to only find this land and everything around it he once knew, is quite altered with tribal creatures and treasures.

3.title: The Switch

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Miles (Emilio Dosal) and his wife Elise (Chachi Gonzales) live the life of high rises, helicopters and fast cars, but when a cat and mouse game of power and dominance gets out of hand, neither one is prepared for the outcome.

4.title: The Wish

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: A princess (Arielle Elonys), alone in her castle, discovers a novel that tells many stories of life in another realm and the wonders that come with its discoveries. As she wonders about life as a normal girl, her wistful fantasy comes true, and she becomes a commoner in the city.

5.title: Perchance to Dream

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: When Zoe Croft (Chachi Gonzales) falls asleep, she awakens in a mystical world where her doll has come to life. This episode is an extended scene from the feature length film "The Legend of DarkHorse County."

6.title: Tunel Zvire

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: JaJa is bitten and becomes a recluse in a nearby dark tunnel with hopes she can avoid the temptations to draw blood on the innocent. The Avengers are sent in to rescue her.

1.title: The Book of Records

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Jon's nightmare, plagued by a vicious beast, has repeated every night since childhood. What Jon soon realizes is that he must defeat this evil creature in order to find the truth he seeks.

2.title: The King & I

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Two obsessed fans take their love of Britney Spears and Michael Jackson to the extreme, each fully adopting their persona. When "Britney Jean Spears" (Katrina Hansen) intercepts a note from her love - "Michael Jackson" (Shawn Welling) - to another woman, Britney becomes furious and bent on revenge. Now, MJ has to find a way to clear his name and prove his love for Britney.

3.title: Red Rum

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: A young man (Phillip Chbeeb) reflects on his lost love (Jaja Vankova), as he drinks his way through the pain. He shows his pain and his remembrance through the cinematic language of dance.

4.title: Game Over

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Young Katie Fischer (Raven Carrell) knew she had a special gift that she must only use against those who are evil. One day, while she sat playing her Nintendo, a couple bullies came over, taunting her. She warned them that if they hurt her or anyone she cared about, she would trap them inside her Nintendo.

5.title: Big Tall Wish

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Jon (Shawn Welling) and Katie (Katrina Hansen) are middle class American down on their luck trying to get by with a back lot mechanic shop. When Katie is tragically murdered at their shop, their daughter makes a Big Tall Wish to bring her mother back.

6.title: Amnesty

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Sheriff John Ford (Shawn Welling) responds to a report that a group of renegades are dancing in a private home. Although dancing has been outlawed, Dr. Strange (Brian Friedman) enlightens John in an fierce dance. John picks the sometimes painful truth of reality (red) over the blissful ignorance of illusion (blue). John departs on a mission to release imprisoned dancers.

7.title: The Game

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: In this American talent show, famed superstar Zoe Croft (ChaChi Gonzales) and her fellow judges search for the entertainer who has "Game."

1.title: Alive

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: In a future world devastated by disease, Agent Croft (Chachi Gonzales), from AXI headquarters, is sent forward in time to deliver a cure, enclosed in a gray armored case, to one of the last surviving "Humans," in hopes of saving our race. Machine soldiers from the "Dark Army" chase down Agent Swift after breaking into the Human rebel hideout. Minutes remain to keep humanity "Alive."

2.title: The 5 Second Rule

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: In folklore, the five-second rule states that food dropped on the ground, or even thrown in the garbage, will not be significantly contaminated with bacteria if it is picked up within five seconds of being dropped. Some may earnestly believe this assertion, whereas other people employ, if you will, that food, after leaving it to rot, arbitrarily finds its way back to you, uncontaminated and good to eat.

3.title: Adamo

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: There's trouble in paradise when Adam finds he doesn't love Eve anymore. Adam's rib gives him a gift from her rib. The gift of love.

4.title: Salvator

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: This episode is a tribute to a mid-century French legend, "Jougler De Notre Dame," about 2 artists who perform in front of a Catholic statue of Mary or Christ, and a miracle happens. Two girls are devastated when their pet is killed by a traffic accident, and the girls pray to Jesus for the return of their pet.

5.title: The Serf

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Ruled by vain and evil women, one young man tries to break their hold and free himself from his serfdom.

6.title: The Gift

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: A time machine: 0 to 5,000 miles and 100 years in 1.2 seconds. Where would you go and what would await you?

1.title: The Mechanic

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Two young girls find a mysterious key that take them to a place governed by machinists and the two Mechanics (Lee Majors, Bob Boudreaux). This mystical garage lost in time sets these girls on the right road to happiness.

2.title: The Tree of Light

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: A young woman (Jaja Vankova) dances in the shadow of a tall, winding tree, awash in glowing sunshine. Inspired by the beauty of her natural surroundings and by the music of Beethoven, she explores the oneness of nature and her longing to be a part of it.

3.title: The Clean Up Man

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: What happens when dancers are left in a meticulously clean Crossfit gym? Dance vignettes, quick-fire comedy, and havoc.

4.title: Monsterz

episode of.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: An even madder scientist builds a female monster and mate to a lost canine. Told from Igor's perspective, we see the troubled young girl taken to her grave, her redemptive friendship with Rex the young canine assistant to medical student Victor Ford, and become eyewitnesses to the emergence of how innocents can break free the chains of death.

imdb.plot outline: This series chronicles the tale of the war between the combative Dark Army and the mythical powers of AXI: Avengers of Xtreme Illusions. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, the Avengers of Xtreme Illusions must battle to prevent the Dark Army's fight for a global overthrow. Each episode follows a different Avenger's story within the unfolding conflict.
imdb.title: AXI: Avengers of Extreme Illusions
plot: This series chronicles the tale of the war between the combative Dark Army and the mythical powers of AXI: Avengers of Xtreme Illusions. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, the Avengers of Xtreme Illusions must battle to prevent the Dark Army's fight for a global overthrow. Each episode follows a different Avenger's story within the unfolding conflict.::AXI
